snippet: Despite changing ownership and locations several times since its opening in 1932, Egger’s Ice Cream Parlor, on Staten Island’s north shore, remains a great beacon of the classic cone.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Egger's Ice Cream Parlor, old-fashioned ice cream spot in Staten Island's Port Richmond neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: Despite changing ownership and locations several times since its opening in 1932, Egger’s Ice Cream Parlor, on Staten Island’s north shore, remains a great beacon of the classic cone.

headline.print_headline: A One-Shake, Two-Straws Kind of Place
headline.main: A One-Shake, Two-Straws Kind of Place
